Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by New York (N) in 2015...
Injured on 4/27/2016 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 6 days...
Traded from New York (N) to San Diego on 7/31/2016 (Going to SDN: LF C. Prado. Going to NYN: P A. Pena)...

Had first career hit on 4/2/2018, off Justin Masterson (ATL)...
Injured on 4/12/2018 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 5/16/2018, off Tim Lincecum (SF)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2019...
Released by San Diego on 6/19/2023...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 6/19/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $492,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Florida on 8/20/2023...
